title: What happens when a club gets below 5 members?
body: Title. Since you need 5 members to set up a tag, does the club lose its tag if it gets to less than 5 members afterwards?

replies.body: I'm not aware of any upkeep required to maintain your club.  After you've gotten it set up, you can't remove players as needed.  Let me know if that clears things up!
No it doesn't lose it's tag
